Actionable Text & Icons

To use this module, follow the instructions in the README. (For background on PXd, read the Getting Started documentation.)

px-actionable-text-icons-design

How to Use

Add to component Sass file:


Actionable Text & Icons

Regular Sizing

Sass Flags

To enable actionable text or icons the following Sass flags are required:

Default

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

Selected

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

Action

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.

Disabled

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.
Default Selected Action Disabled

Small Sizing

Sass Flag

To enable actionable text or icons the following Sass flag is required:

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.
Default

Large

Sass Flag

To enable actionable text or icons the following Sass flag is required:

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.
Default

Huge

Sass Flag

To enable actionable text or icons the following Sass flag is required:

Flag must be set before @import in component Sass file.
Default
